name: Array.js
body:
### Welcome to array.js
array.js offers native array methods not supported by old browsers like:

```
isArray, indexOf, lastIndexOf, filter, forEach, map, some, every
```

### How to use it
Just add 

```
<script type="text/javascript" src="array.js"></script>
```

and you'll be able to safely use native array methods

### Documentation
You can find good documentation about array methods at mozilla developer page https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array/prototype
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: Native array methods not supported by old browsers
